meanings.sent1: The carpenter gabelled the new house with skill.
meanings.sent2: They gabelled the roof of the barn to make it more stable.
meanings.sent3: The playful kittens gabelled their cardboard box fort.
meanings.sent4: Her smile gabelled the room with warmth and joy.
meanings.sent5: The artist gabelled the canvas with vibrant colors, creating a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: To build or furnish with gables.
meanings.sent1: The construction crew gabelled the entire neighborhood in record time.
meanings.sent2: We gabelled the old cottage to give it a charming look.
meanings.sent3: The birds gabelled their nests with twigs and leaves.
meanings.sent4: His words gabelled the story with intrigue and suspense.
meanings.sent5: The architect gabelled the building with elegant designs, impressing everyone.
